data.message: Facebook - on the Market Search, it would be helpful if when someone clicks interested, Facebook would ask you to verify your interest.  I sometimes click interested by accident and next thing I know I’m getting a messenger message from the seller.  All this time they are thinking they have a sale and I have to explain I clicked interested by mistake.  Thank you for your help with this.

replies.message: That's a great idea, Olga. We truly appreciate feedback from the Facebook community, and we use it to help inform our decisions. When you have ideas you'd like to share with us, you can let us know here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Kiara
